page.title: 15 Holidays in 1985
page.content: Out of 140 children in our school only 29 went on holiday in 1985. Holidays are an annual {event }for many families. The most popular places for{holidays}were Wales and Yorkshire. some people went abroad to such{places as Germany, Italy and France. The people who went on holiday stayed in the following places: Hotels Caravans Holiday homes Boats Guest Houses With relatives Of the people who stayed in Britain people went to Scotland, Sussex, Isle of Wight, Norfolk and Kent. Some of the people who stayed at home went on{day trips}to places around Mistley.
